get.summary: JSON Schema definition for the enumeration ValueSet-KeyUsage

ValueSet-KeyUsage.title: WHO GDHCN  Key Usage ValueSet Schema
ValueSet-KeyUsage.description: JSON Schema for WHO GDHCN  Key Usage ValueSet ValueSet codes. Generated from FHIR expansions using IRI format.
ValueSet-KeyUsage.narrative: This schema validates IRI-formatted codes for the WHO GDHCN  Key Usage ValueSet ValueSet. Each enum value includes the system URI in the format {systemuri}#{code} to match JSON-LD enumeration IRIs. Display values are available at http://smart.who.int/trust/ValueSet-KeyUsage.displays.json. For a complete listing of all ValueSets, see artifacts.html#terminology-value-sets.
